Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.util

Record Class SidedPos

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.util.SidedPos
Record Components:
pos - the block-position.
side - the side of the block-position.
public record SidedPos(@NotNull net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos, @NotNull net.minecraft.util.math.Direction side) extends Record
Represents both a block-position and the side of that block-position.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field

    static com.mojang.serialization.Codec<SidedPos>
    CODEC
    Codec for encoding and decoding SidedPoses with a matching structure as produced and consumed by toNbt(NbtCompound) and fromNbt(NbtCompound).
